column2:
"Mmm, yeah, you've become quite
accustomed to your role as a Ranger.
You're looking more like a veteran."
"But in fact, you can only use the grenade launcher well. ...oh, that could never be the case, right?!"

"So that's why you should test your strength! Complete the quest I give
you with the assault rifle!"

"As always, I'll be here
watching you on the monitor.
Fire yourself up and get going!"
